title: Get Microsoft Office for life — and it’s under $60.
content:
Macworld

Success often starts with organization, control, and execution. There’s no more proven system for achieving all three in your professional life than with the productivity apps and other tools found in Microsoft Office.

To bolster your success, you can grab Microsoft Office 2021 for Mac or Windows for only $55.99 with code ENJOY20 through March 10. 

With the complete set of apps available in Microsoft Office 2021, you’ll be prepared for just about any personal, professional, or creative project. Both licenses afford users lifetime access to Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Teams, and OneNote. Draft a well-written work proposal with Word, create a budget spreadsheet with Excel, or collaborate in real-time through virtual work calls — Microsoft Office 2021 is a time-tested solution that actually works.

Windows users will also gain lifetime access to Publisher and Access. Publisher allows for easy creation of flyers, newsletters, and the like, and Access makes large data management more effortless.

You just need to ensure that your device meets system requirements. Mac users should have at least Monterey Version 12, while Windows users must have Windows 10 or 11. 

Say goodbye to subscription fees for your favorite productivity apps when you use code ENJOY20 until March 10 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific to grab:

  • Lifetime access to Microsoft Office Home and Business 2021 for Mac for just $55.99.
  • Lifetime access to Microsoft Office Professional 2021 for Windows for just $55.99.
